1300840.name: SpaceCrooks: The End of Time
1300840.description:
SpaceCrooks is a hybrid rail-shooter/flight-sim (Starfox-clone) that combines roguelite gameplay with an unlocking comedic sci-fi visual novel. Follow kAla, ♩♩B₄♯♩C♭♩E♭, and as they carve a path of mayhem in this genre soup.

  • Procedurally generated enemy drones and boss ships with individually destructible weapons and armor
  • Weapon and item drops with incredible randomized enhancements
  • A wide variety of procedurally generated landscapes and tunnels that smoothly mix organic and inorganic environments.
  • Special madlibs-style procedurally generated NPCs and mission plotlines to interact with
  • Separate, non-procedural events forming a parallel over-arching narrative
